data.title: Sing It Loud - Sing It Loud EP
data.meta_description: Produced by Motion City Soundtrack's Josh Cain and mixed by Mark Trombino (Jimmy Eat World, the Starting Line), the new EP features re-recorded versions of the insanely infectious tracks "No One Can Touch Us" (featuring Alex Gaskarth from All Time Low), "Bite Your Lip" and "Come Around' as well as two brand new songs "I've Got A Feeling" and "Best Beating Heart."
data.text: Produced by Motion City Soundtrack's Josh Cain and mixed by Mark Trombino (Jimmy Eat World, the Starting Line), the new EP features re-recorded versions of the insanely infectious tracks "No One Can Touch Us" (featuring Alex Gaskarth from All Time Low), "Bite Your Lip" and "Come Around' as well as two brand new songs "I've Got A Feeling" and "Best Beating Heart."
